title: How I Built My Portfolio Website
content:
Building my portfolio website was an exciting journey that allowed me to combine creativity with technical expertise. I used React + Vite to set up the framework, which offered fast build times and a smooth development experience. From selecting the right design elements to ensuring the site is fully responsive, every step was a learning experience.

Key highlights of the process:
- Choosing React + Vite: It provided a modern, optimized setup for developing and deploying the project efficiently.
- Personalized Design: I designed the website to reflect my personality and skills, using custom themes and animations.
- Challenges: Configuring routing and state management for dynamic content was initially tricky, but diving into React Router and Context API helped me overcome these challenges.
- Result: A sleek, functional portfolio that showcases my skills and projects.
